summary: The document is a secret memorandum from August 23, 1976, detailing Frank Sturgis's activities, including his upcoming appearance on the Tomorrow Show, his acquisition of cryptographic material related to Albania from Marita Lorenz in New York, and his efforts to contact Senator Baker to hand over this material. The DCD, informed by Jon French, planned to monitor the situation regarding the material's potential transfer to Senator Baker.
key_findings: Frank Sturgis was scheduled to appear on the Tomorrow Show on August 24, 1976.
Sturgis acquired cryptographic material from Marita Lorenz, which appeared to be related to Albania.
Sturgis made attempts to contact Senator Baker for the purpose of handing over the cryptographic material.
The DCD planned to oversee the situation to ascertain whether the material would indeed be transferred to Senator Baker.
